input_text:
Job Title: Lead Installation Technician

Location: Bradenton, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Description 

The client has installed and provided services for many leading Colleges and Universities, as well as more than 500 businesses, including some of the largest Biotechnology and Pharmaceutical companies, Commercial Property Management Firms, Financial Institutions, Sports Arenas and Healthcare Facilities. The client's PA Entity, founded in 2021, is management by Chris Wetzel, who took the role of Executive VP and Principal of the company at the start of 2022. With over 40 years of experience in the electronic security industry, Chris is considered an industry expert and is often consulted by manufacturers and industry colleagues. If you are looking for a security integrator to design, install and maintain your security system, the client will provide the highest level of service and support no matter where your located.

They are looking for a Lead Technician to join their growing team and come in to be an asset in leading the charge. This person will be able to be self reliant, work independent and run installation projects on their own. They need to have solid understanding of access control, cameras and intrusion systems to succeed in this role.

 Skills 

Access control, Security, Cctv, Install, Wiring panels, Service, Troubleshooting, Electrical

 Top Skills Details 

Access control,Security,Cctv,Install,Wiring panels

 Additional Skills & Qualifications 

ProgrammingServiceLeadershipCertifications: Feenics, RS2, Genetec, Software house, LenelS2, Bosch, Exacq, Brivo, and EagleEye


 Experience Level 

Intermediate Level

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Lead Installation Technician
job_responsibilities: Solid understanding of access control, cameras, and intrusion systems
